ServicesPage.title: Our Services
ServicesPage.subtitle: Professional cleaning solutions designed to meet all your needs
ServicesPage.generalCleaningDesc: Regular and thorough cleaning services to ensure clean, healthy and pleasant spaces on a daily basis.
ServicesPage.windowCleaningDesc: Perfectly clean, streak-free windows that allow natural light to shine through.
ServicesPage.officeCleaningDesc: A clean and organised work environment to enhance comfort, well-being and productivity.
ServicesPage.conciergeServiceDesc: Versatile support for the management of your premises, including light maintenance, small tasks and day-to-day assistance.
ServicesPage.housekeeperDesc: Reliable and professional housekeeping services tailored to your everyday household needs.
ServicesPage.springCleaningDesc: Deep and detailed cleaning services to refresh and revitalise your interior.
ServicesPage.constructionCleaningDesc: Comprehensive removal of dust, debris and residues after construction or renovation work.
ServicesPage.endOfLeaseCleaningDesc: Impeccable cleaning to ensure a smooth handover and a successful property inspection.

GeneralCleaningPage.title: General Cleaning
GeneralCleaningPage.subtitle: A clean, healthy and immaculate environment for your home or business premises.

intro.title: Thorough and Reliable Cleaning
intro.text: Our general cleaning service is designed to keep your spaces clean, organised and pleasant on a daily basis. Whether for a house, apartment or commercial premises, our teams deliver meticulous and dependable results.

items.surfaces: Cleaning and disinfection of all surfaces
items.livingAreas: Maintenance of living areas, bedrooms and offices
items.bathroom: Complete cleaning of bathrooms and sanitary facilities
items.windows: Interior cleaning of accessible windows and mirrors
items.details: Attention to details and finishing touches
items.floors: Vacuuming and washing of all floors

expertise.title: Professional Expertise
expertise.text: Trained and experienced staff with close attention to detail.

flexibility.title: Total Flexibility
flexibility.text: One-off or regular services tailored to your needs.

eco.title: Responsible Products
eco.text: Use of effective, environmentally friendly cleaning products.

final.title: Looking for spotless cleaning?
final.text: Contact us today for a fast and personalised quote.

OfficeCleaningPage.title: Office Cleaning
OfficeCleaningPage.subtitle: Clean, healthy and professional workspaces to support the well-being of your teams.

intro.title: An Impeccable Work Environment
intro.text: We provide office cleaning services tailored to businesses of all sizes. Our teams deliver thorough and discreet cleaning to ensure a clean, healthy and pleasant working environment every day.

items.surfaces: Cleaning and disinfection of all surfaces
items.workspaces: Maintenance of offices, open-plan workspaces and meeting rooms
items.kitchen: Complete cleaning of kitchens and break areas
items.furniture: Cleaning of accessible furniture and equipment
items.details: Attention to details and finishing touches
items.floors: Vacuuming and washing of all floors

expertise.title: Professional Standards
expertise.text: Teams trained to meet the specific requirements of professional environments.

flexibility.title: Flexible Scheduling
flexibility.text: Services adapted to your constraints: early morning, daytime or evening.

confidentiality.title: Discretion and Confidentiality
confidentiality.text: Full respect for your premises, documents and professional equipment.

final.title: A Clean Office Reflects a Professional Image
final.text: Contact us for a personalised quote and a cleaning service tailored to your business.

ConstructionCleaningPage.title: Post-Construction Cleaning
ConstructionCleaningPage.subtitle: Thorough cleaning after construction or renovation to make your spaces ready for use or handover.

intro.title: Professional Cleaning After Construction
intro.text: Our post-construction cleaning service efficiently removes dust, debris, and residues left behind after building or renovation work. We prepare your spaces for immediate use or smooth handover.

items.debris: Removal of debris, dust, and construction waste
items.surfaces: Cleaning and degreasing of all surfaces
items.windows: Cleaning of windows, frames, and glass surfaces
items.details: Attention to details and finishing touches
items.floors: Deep vacuuming and washing of all floors
items.airing: Complete ventilation of the premises after cleaning

expertise.title: Construction Expertise
expertise.text: Teams trained to meet the specific requirements of post-construction cleaning.

equipment.title: Professional Equipment
equipment.text: Use of equipment and products specifically suited for construction residues.

deadlines.title: Deadline Compliance
deadlines.text: Fast interventions to ensure timely handover or operational readiness.

final.title: Spaces Ready for Use
final.text: Entrust us with your post-construction cleaning for impeccable, professional results.

intro.title: Cleaning That Meets Return Requirements
intro.text: End-of-tenancy cleaning is a crucial step during a move. We carry out deep cleaning to ensure the property meets the standards expected by landlords and real estate agencies.

WindowCleaningPage.title: Window Cleaning
WindowCleaningPage.subtitle: Spotless windows, whether for your home or professional premises.

intro.title: Professional and Comprehensive Window Cleaning
intro.text: We provide window cleaning for all types of buildings: houses, apartments, and commercial spaces. Our teams use the most effective techniques and products to ensure a streak-free finish.

items.accessories: Dusting of nearby blinds and accessories
items.commercialExtra: For commercial spaces: high windows and shopfronts accessible with lifts or professional ladders

expertise.title: Expertise
expertise.text: Technicians trained in window cleaning techniques, including work at height if needed.

safety.title: Safety
safety.text: Strict adherence to safety standards for working at heights.

eco.title: Eco-Friendly Products
eco.text: Use of environmentally safe products that leave no streaks.

final.title: Sparkling Windows, Safely
final.text: Entrust us with your windows for a flawless result, at home or in your professional spaces.

intro.text: Spring cleaning is the perfect opportunity to deep-clean every room, remove accumulated dust, and prepare your home for the new season. We work carefully and efficiently to achieve impeccable results.

AboutPage.title: About CDO Multiservices
AboutPage.subtitle: Your trusted partner for a spotless environment since 2025
AboutPage.history_1: Founded in 2025, CDO Multiservices was born from a passion for delivering exceptional cleaning services across Switzerland. Our dedicated team is committed to maintaining the highest standards of cleanliness and professionalism.
AboutPage.history_2: Over the years, we have developed deep expertise in residential, commercial, and industrial cleaning while staying true to our core values: quality, reliability, and customer satisfaction.
AboutPage.history_3: Today, we proudly serve over 35 satisfied clients across Switzerland with a team of qualified professionals and state-of-the-art equipment.
AboutPage.value_desc_1: We strive for excellence in every project, using the best practices and equipment.
AboutPage.value_desc_2: Our team is trained in the latest cleaning techniques and safety standards.
AboutPage.value_desc_3: We use eco-friendly products to protect your health and the planet.
AboutPage.cta_descr: Contact us today for a free quote and experience the CDO Multiservices difference.

PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.section_1_1_2: is operated by CDO Multiservices Sàrl, a company based in Geneva, Switzerland, which acts as the data controller within the meaning of the Swiss Federal Act on Data Protection (FADP).
PrivacyPolicy.section_1_2: This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect the personal data of users of our website. By using this site, you agree to the practices described in this policy.
PrivacyPolicy.section_1_3: We attach great importance to the protection of your personal data and are committed to processing it confidentially and securely.

PrivacyPolicy.section_2_7: These data are used for statistical, security, and site improvement purposes.

PrivacyPolicy.section_2_1_8: These data are voluntarily provided by the user.

PrivacyPolicy.section_3_1: responding to requests submitted via the contact form
PrivacyPolicy.section_3_3: ensuring proper operation and security of the website
PrivacyPolicy.section_3_6: We only collect data strictly necessary for these purposes (data minimization principle – art. 6 FADP).
PrivacyPolicy.section_4: The processing of personal data is based on:
PrivacyPolicy.section_4_2: the legitimate interest of the data controller (site security, technical operation)
PrivacyPolicy.section_5: Our website uses cookies to improve the user experience and analyze site usage.
PrivacyPolicy.section_5_2: You can configure your browser at any time to refuse or delete cookies.
PrivacyPolicy.section_5_3: Refusing certain cookies may, however, affect the proper functioning of the website.
PrivacyPolicy.section_6: Personal data is retained only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected:
PrivacyPolicy.section_6_1: data from contact forms: duration of request processing, then limited archiving
PrivacyPolicy.section_6_2: technical and statistical data: limited duration or anonymization
PrivacyPolicy.section_7: In accordance with the FADP, you have the following rights:
PrivacyPolicy.section_7_1: right to access your personal data
PrivacyPolicy.section_7_3: right to erasure, where legally possible
PrivacyPolicy.section_7_5: right to request restriction of processing

PrivacyPolicy.section_9: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data against unauthorized access, loss, alteration, or disclosure.
